name: Dracozolt
description: In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its powerful lower body, but it went extinct anyway after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.

attacks.name: Amping Up
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Amping Up attack does 90 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t attack.
